page.title: 19Local Press-Stamford Bridge
page.content: News Items-18-25th June: Opening in July is the Grange Nursing Home with two acres of landscaped gardens. A beautifully restored Victorian country house,it can accommodate 27 old folk. :To help the Evening Press Scanner Appeal,3 Stamford Bridge men will try a parachute jump on June 30th, sponsored by their friends.:Motorists driving through Stamford Bridge were met by fierce 'Vikings'.But their weapons were only collecting tins.They were raising money for the new Sports Centre:Stamford Bridge has entered the Britain in Bloom competition.The first judging took place in May.The judges praised the Shallows area and thought there were a number of attractive gardens.Points were given to the local children who kept the village free of litter.
